title: Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions Names Gregg Margosian as Chief Operating Officer
text:
Industry veteran to lead business operations for point of sale market share leader
RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions (TGCS) , the global market share leader in installed retail point of sale (POS) technology, announced that Gregg Margosian has been named its Chief Operating Officer effective April 1, 2018.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180409005288/en/
Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions names Gregg Margosian as Chief Operating Officer. (Photo: Business Wire)
In this role, Margosian will be responsible for business operations including global supply chain, process reengineering, self-checkout operations, human resources, IT and the company’s Innovation Lab in Raleigh, NC. Margosian, formerly TGCS’ Senior Vice President, Portfolio Management and R&D, is a well-known industry leader with nearly a decade in retail technology.
“I am looking forward to helping TGCS continue to be the innovation leader in retail commerce and self-service technologies,” said Margosian. “This year, we will be introducing a number of new hardware and software products that build upon our reputation for rock solid performance. These Designed for Retail TM solutions provide the reliability, security and innovation that our customers demand.”
“Gregg brings years of global retail experience to this position including broad expertise in services, portfolio management and R&D,” said TGCS president and CEO, Scott Maccabe. “Gregg will play a key role in helping TGCS grow revenue and streamline our business. I am confident that Gregg and his team will help the company continue to improve our operational efficiency and effectiveness.”
About Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions
As the market share leader in retail store technology, Toshiba’s Brilliant Commerce TM , enables retailers to deliver engaged shopping experiences, gain actionable insights and provide frictionless checkout.
With a global team of dedicated business partners, we deliver innovative commerce solutions that transform checkout, provide seamless consumer interactions and optimize retail operations that are changing the retail landscape.
